landing.hero_subtitle: GeoTapp unifies workforce management, process optimization, and SEO in a single AI-powered suite.
landing.features_subtitle: A complete suite of tools to grow your company.
landing.cta_subtitle: Join hundreds of companies using GeoTapp today.

flow.title: Invoice While Still at the Client.
flow.subtitle: Real example: A plumber client was losing about €400/mo in unmarked small jobs. With Flow, he converts the report into an invoice with one click. Result: +€4,800/year net profit.

features.crm: Synced CRM: Update a contact once, it updates everywhere.
features.pipeline: Visual Pipeline: Move cards from "To Do" to "Paid". Satisfying.

app.title: Your Team in Your Pocket.
app.subtitle: No more doubts about on-site presence. The App certifies location only at clock-in/out. Full Privacy respect, zero disputes.

zenith.title: Don't Write for Robots. Write to Win.
zenith.subtitle: Everyone knows keywords. Few know Semantic Intent. Zenith analyzes top 10 Google results, understands what your article lacks, and tells you exactly how to fill the gap.

fortyx.title: 800ms. Or You're Out.
fortyx.subtitle: Amazon calculated that 100ms delay costs 1% of sales. How much is your slow site costing you? FortyX isn't just a cache. It rewrites how the server delivers pages.

core.title: Power Under the Hood.
core.subtitle: We don't build toys. GeoTapp is an enterprise platform designed to scale vertically. Here are the technologies making the magic happen, explained without filters.

features.title: Offline-First Engine (CRDT)
features.desc: Connection drops, work doesn't. We embedded an encrypted SQLite DB directly in the App. We use CRDT algorithms for sync.

features.title: Zero-Knowledge Encryption
features.desc: Privacy isn't a legal checkbox, it's math. We use AES-256 for data at rest and TLS 1.3 for transit.

features.title: Real-Time WebSocket
features.desc: Stop hitting F5. Thanks to bidirectional WebSockets, info travels instantly. If a tech closes a ticket in Rome, the manager in Milan sees the green dot.

features.title: Scalable Data Lake
features.desc: From 100 to 100M records without blinking. We use partitioned PostgreSQL to handle massive data volumes.

footer_cta.title:
Stop Playing.
Start Billing.
footer_cta.subtitle: Thousands of pros use GeoTapp every day. Join those who decided to reclaim their time.

pricing.title: Choose Your Arsenal.
pricing.subtitle: Flexible solutions for every stage of your growth.
pricing.vat_note: All prices exclude VAT. Billing according to terms of service.

products.name: GeoTapp APP
products.desc: The complete solution to track attendance, jobs, and expenses. Price per user/year.

products.name: GeoTapp FLOW Lifetime
products.desc: Pay once, use forever. Full access to GeoTapp Flow with no recurring fees. Includes future updates.

products.name: GeoTapp FLOW Business
products.desc: Advanced workflow management, unlimited automation, and priority support.

products.name: GeoTapp FLOW Team
products.desc: Ideal for workgroups needing coordination and shared processes.

products.name: GeoTapp FLOW Solo
products.desc: All the power of Flow for the single professional.

products.name: FortyX Commander AI (Yearly)
products.desc: Maximum control with integrated J.A.R.V.I.S. AI assistant for auto management & optimization.

products.name: FortyX Commander (Yearly)
products.desc: All Commander tools without the AI assistant.

products.name: FortyX Hero AI (Yearly)
products.desc: Top performance with Artificial Intelligence help for fast sites.

products.name: FortyX Soldier (Yearly)
products.desc: The basics to keep your WordPress site secure and fast.

products.name: Zenith SEO Agency AI (Yearly)
products.desc: Advanced AI tools to manage multiple clients and dominate SERPs.

products.name: Zenith SEO Agency (Yearly)
products.desc: Client management and advanced reporting without AI content generation.

products.name: Zenith SEO AI Pro (Yearly)
products.desc: The perfect balance between AI power and cost for the SEO professional.

products.name: Zenith SEO Starter (Yearly)
products.desc: Everything you need to optimize your first website.

contact.title: Let's Talk Business.
contact.subtitle: You don't need another ticket opened into the void. You need answers.
contact.guarantee_text: Our Enterprise clients have an average first response time of 12 minutes.

flow.hero_title:
GeoTapp Flow.
Operating System.
flow.hero_subtitle: We don't use Excel sheets. We don't use post-its. GeoTapp Flow is the fluid architecture connecting every aspect of your company, from the first lead to the last invoice.
flow.grid_subtitle: Each module is an independent but interconnected system. Click to access source codes.

nexus-core.name: Nexus CRM
nexus-core.short: Sovereign Sales Pipeline. Manage Leads, Opportunities, and Deals to close contracts at light speed.
nexus-core.full:
### Your Commercial War Machine.

Selling isn't luck. It's engineering.
**Nexus Core** structures your commercial chaos into a military pipeline.

#### Pipeline Management

Visualize every deal. Know exactly where the money is stuck.
- Lead (Cold Contact)
- Meeting (Negotiating)
- Proposal (Quote Sent)
- Won (Money in the Bank)

#### Predictive Intelligence

Nexus doesn't just tell you "who" to call, but "when".
It tracks email opens.
If a Lead opens your quote 5 times in an hour, Nexus alerts you: "CALL NOW".
Transform salespeople into snipers.

titan-flow.name: Titan Flow
titan-flow.short: The Client signs, the system works. Automatic generation of client portals, document requests, and welcome tasks.
titan-flow.full:
### The Perfect Start. Effortless.

You closed the deal. Great. Now the bureaucratic nightmare begins: "Send me the logo", "Fill out the form", "Where is the signed contract?".
**Titan Flow** automates bureaucracy.

#### Zero-Touch Onboarding

As soon as the status moves to "Deals Won", Titan wakes up.
1. Sends a welcome email to the client.
2. Generates a secure **Client Portal**.
3. Assigns tasks to the client: "Upload Certificate", "Sign NDA", "Upload Brand Assets".

#### The Gentle "Watchdog"

Client doesn't upload files? You do nothing.
Titan sends automatic (and gentle) reminders every 48 hours.
You get notified only when everything is ready to work.
Start the project only when you have all the pieces. No more delays due to "missing materials".

ledger-prime.name: Ledger Prime
ledger-prime.short: Money never sleeps. Automatic invoice generation, Stripe collections, and real-time bank reconciliation.
ledger-prime.full:
### Your Digital CFO Working 24/7.

Accounting is boring. It's dangerous (if you make mistakes). And it's slow.
**Ledger Prime** is the end of manual accounting.

#### Quote-to-Cash (The Speed of Money)

The cycle is closed and armored.
1. Create a Quote in 30 seconds selecting products from the list.
2. The client receives a secure link. Signs digitally from their phone.
3. **BAM**. Ledger Prime instantly converts the Quote into a Pro-forma or Final Invoice.
4. If you have Stripe connected, the client pays by credit card instantly.

Money hits the account while you are still shaking hands.

quantum-logistics.name: Quantum Logistics
quantum-logistics.short: Every atom tracked. Multi-site Warehouse Management with movement tracking and predictive reordering.
quantum-logistics.full:
### Warehouse Omniscience.

"I don't know if I have it in stock". This phrase costs billions to companies every year.
With **Quantum Logistics**, you know. Always.

#### Live Stock Tracking

Every product has a digital soul.
When you create a sales invoice, the warehouse decrements automatically.
Manage manual movements, scrap, returns, and transfers between different sites.

#### Predictive Reordering (The Oracle)

Quantum doesn't just count. It predicts.
Set a "Min Stock Level".
When you drop below the threshold, the system alerts you and prepares the order for the supplier.
Never lose sales again for "product not available".

supply-command.name: Supply Command
supply-command.short: Total Supplier Control. Generate Purchase Orders, track deliveries, and manage incoming costs.
supply-command.full:
### You Buy. You Command.

To sell you must buy. But purchasing is often chaotic: lost emails, wrong prices, late deliveries.
**Supply Command** puts a leash on your suppliers.

#### Purchase Orders (The Perfect Order)

Create professional Purchase Orders (PO) in few clicks.
Send them via email directly from the system.
When goods arrive, transform them into a "Warehouse Receipt" with one button.
No more "I ordered 10, 9 arrived". The system tracks discrepancies.

#### Supplier Intelligence

Who is the most punctual supplier? Who raised prices silently?
Supply Command historicizes every transaction and gives you negotiating power on costs.

the-architect.name: The Architect
the-architect.short: Time is the scarcest resource. Manage Projects, Tasks, and Time Tracking to know exactly how much every job costs you.
the-architect.full:
### Build Cathedrals, Not Sandcastles.

Managing complex projects via email or WhatsApp is professional suicide.
**The Architect** brings order to creative chaos.

#### Fractal Structure

Every Client has Projects. Every Project has Tasks. Every Task has Deadlines.
Everything is nested. Everything is visible.
Assign tasks to the team with a click. Define priorities (Urgent, High, Low).
Visualize progress on Gantt charts or Kanban Boards.

#### Profitability X-Ray

This is the feature agencies fear and love.
Your employees track time (Time Logs) on tasks.
You set an hourly cost per employee and a sales price for the client.
The Architect calculates in real-time the **Real Margin** of the project.
Working at a loss? You'll know *while* it happens.

the-auditor.name: The Auditor
the-auditor.short: The end of lost receipts. Employees photograph receipts, AI digitizes them and assigns them to projects.
the-auditor.full:
### Zero Paper. Zero Fraud.

Expense reports are every administration's nightmare. Faded receipts, lost, or worse, "creative".
**The Auditor** is the ruthless accountant living in the cloud.

#### Snap & Forget

Your technician takes a client to lunch.
1. Pays.
2. Opens GeoTapp app.
3. Photographs receipt.
Done. Can throw away the paper.

#### Project Allocation

The system asks: "For which Project?".
The technician selects "Client X".
The expense is immediately charged to that project's costs (reducing margin in real-time on The Architect).
At month end, administration has a perfect PDF report.

the-uplink.name: The Uplink
the-uplink.short: The office is everywhere. Native mobile app for field technicians: photos, signatures, reports, and expenses in real-time.
the-uplink.full:
### Reality is Out of Office.

Real companies have people in the field. Technicians, salespeople, installers.
If they must wait to return to office to enter data, you lost half a day of productivity.
**The Uplink** is the neural extension of the system in the physical world.

#### Native Power (Flutter Engine)

Not a "responsive site". It's a powerful, fast mobile app using camera, GPS, and push notifications.
A technician finishes the job:
1. Opens app.
2. Takes photos of finished work.
3. Logs hours (Time Log).
4. Gets client signature on screen.
5. Sends.

#### Instant Sync

In the same second, in office, The Architect receives time log. Ledger Prime prepares invoice.
The cycle is instant.

the-oracle.name: The Oracle
the-oracle.short: Look at the past to predict the future. Real-time analytic dashboards for Cash Flow, Churn Rate, and Performance.
the-oracle.full:
### Data, Not Opinions.

"I think we are doing well". "It seems sales are rising".
These phrases are forbidden.
**The Oracle** has no opinions. It has charts.

#### The Executive Dashboard

As soon as you login, you see the naked truth:
1. **MRR (Monthly Recurring Revenue)**: How much you bill automatically every month.
2. **Churn Rate**: How many clients you are losing.
3. **Cash Flow Forecast**: How much money you will have in bank in 30 days based on invoice due dates.

No Excel sheet to update. Data flows alive from daily operations.
Drive your company looking at the dashboard, not the rearview mirror.

app.hero_title:
GeoTapp App.
Your Office in Pocket.
app.hero_subtitle: Give your technicians superpowers. Reports, photos, signatures, and expenses directly from the site. Instant synchronization with HQ.
app.grid_subtitle: Every tool is designed for those who work with their hands and have no time to lose.

timelock-alpha.name: Timelock Alpha
timelock-alpha.short: Smart geolocated clock-ins. Start/Stop on job precise to the second with GPS verification.
timelock-alpha.full:
### Time is Money. Protect it.

No more inaccurate paper timesheets. **Timelock Alpha** is the definitive system for job tracking.

#### Smart Geofencing
The system allows starting activity only if the technician is actually at the client's. No more "I arrived" from the bar.

#### Session History
Every session is an immutable record: Start Time, End Time, GPS Position, Duration. Everything assigned to the specific job.

event-horizon.name: Event Horizon
event-horizon.short: Shift and intervention planning. Monthly and weekly view with availability management.
event-horizon.full:
### Total Synchronization.

Managing moving personnel requires precision. **Event Horizon** offers a clear view of who does what, and when.

#### Meeting Points
Define meeting points and departure times. The app notifies the team where to meet.

#### Live Availability
Employees confirm presence or report leave directly from the app. The manager sees gaps in the grid before they become problems.

unit-matrix.name: Unit Matrix
unit-matrix.short: Complete digital registry. Role management, certifications, and quick invites via WhatsApp.
unit-matrix.full:
### Know Your Team.

Every operator is a node in the network. **Unit Matrix** centralizes all vital information.

#### Certification Management
See at a glance who has an updated license or safety clearance necessary to enter the site.

#### Rapid Onboarding
Need to add a new technician? Send a magic link via WhatsApp. In 30 seconds they are operational.

sector-grid.name: Sector Grid
sector-grid.short: Site and worksite mapping. Assign teams to correct operational zones.
sector-grid.full:
### Dominate the Territory.

Don't leave teams in the dark. **Sector Grid** defines operational boundaries.

#### Sites & Worksites
Create a database of your clients and worksites. The system knows if an operator is working in the right place.

#### Work Groups
Organize technicians into teams (Alpha, Bravo, Charlie). Assign tasks to the group, not the individual. Maximum efficiency.

energy-logistics.name: Energy Logistics
energy-logistics.short: Fuel expense control and mileage reimbursement. Smart management of cars in use by personnel.
energy-logistics.full:
### Expenses Under Control.

Travel expenses are a critical item. **Energy Logistics** monitors every cent.

#### Digital Fuel Log
The employee records refueling and costs directly at the pump. Takes a photo of the receipt for the digital archive.

#### Car Management
Temporarily assign a car to an employee for the trip. You will always know who is using it and for which job.

neural-link.name: Neural Link
neural-link.short: Internal company board. Send targeted communications to single groups or the whole company.
neural-link.full:
### Radio Silence? Never Again.

WhatsApp is chaotic and mixes with private life. **Neural Link** is the official channel for operational communications.

#### Targeted Communications
Need to notify only the Rome team of a shift change? Do it with a click. No background noise for others.

#### Read Receipts
You will always know who read the notice and who didn't. Clear and transparent responsibility.

payroll-bridge.name: Payroll Bridge
payroll-bridge.short: Direct link with the labor consultant. Attendance export compatible with Zucchetti/TeamSystem.
payroll-bridge.full:
### Payroll Without Headaches.

Month end doesn't have to be a nightmare. **Payroll Bridge** connects operations to administration.

#### Multi-Format Export
Generate attendance files ready for import into most popular payroll software (Zucchetti, INAZ, TeamSystem).

#### Consultant Access
Give limited access to your payroll firm. They can download needed data autonomously, without calling you.

data-core.name: Data Core
data-core.short: Detailed weekly reports in CSV/Excel. Analysis of hours worked per job.
data-core.full:
### Data Don't Lie.

Make decisions based on facts, not feelings. **Data Core** extracts value from daily operations.

#### Weekly Reports
Every Friday, a complete report on the (digital) desk. Who worked, where, and how much.

#### Total Transparency
Employees and Owners download the same monthly report. Counted hours are identical for everyone. No more disputes at month end.

identity-forge.name: Identity Forge
identity-forge.short: YOUR app. Upload your logo and choose the company color theme for a branded experience.
identity-forge.full:
### Your Brand. Your App.

Don't use a generic app. Make your employees feel part of YOUR company.

#### Upload Logo
Your logo stands tall on the login screen and dashboard.

#### Color Themes
Choose from predefined themes (Classic Blue, Emerald, Sunset, Slate, Violet) the one that best fits your corporate image.

fortyx.hero_title:
Not a Plugin.
It's an Alliance.
fortyx.hero_subtitle: We took inspiration from Earth's mightiest heroes. Each module of FortyX has an identity, a superpower, and a mission: protect your site at all costs.
fortyx.grid_subtitle: We didn't write anonymous code. We gave every file a personality. When the server is under attack, we don't activate a firewall. We inspire the Vibranium shield. Click their names to know their story.

quicksilver.name: Quicksilver
quicksilver.short: Generates static HTML copies. Serves content in under 50ms, faster than the human eye can perceive.
quicksilver.full:
### You Didn't See Him. He's Already Done.

Speed is not just a feature. It's survival.
**Quicksilver** doesn't "optimize" loading. It eliminates it.

When a user requests a page, Quicksilver intercepts the process. Before the user clicks, he has already generated a pure **Static HTML** copy.
No PHP. No Database. Just pure data transfer speed.

**Result**: Time To First Byte (TTFB) under 50ms.
Your site doesn't "load". It appears. It's like time stopped for everyone but your server.

mjolnir.name: Mjolnir
mjolnir.short: Wields the power of compression. Smashes JPG and PNG into ultralight WebP upon upload.
mjolnir.full:
### Whoever is Worthy, Shall Possess the Power of Compression.

Images are the number one enemy of performance. Heavy, clumsy, slow.
Mjolnir is the hammer that disciplines them.

#### The Thunder Strike (WebP Conversion)

As soon as you upload an image, Mjolnir hits it with an energy blast.
It instantly converts it to the next-gen **WebP** format.
- Visual quality: Identical.
- File weight: Reduced by 40-70%.

ant-man.name: Ant-Man
ant-man.short: Shrinks to subatomic level. Minifies HTML removing superfluos whitespace to reduce payload.
ant-man.full:
### Small. Powerful. Invisible.

How much wasted space is in your site code? Whitespace, newlines, comments.
The browser doesn't need them. The user doesn't need them.

Ant-Man takes your code to the **Quantum Realm**.

#### Subatomic Compression

Ant-Man analyzes outgoing HTML, CSS and JavaScript code.
Removes whitespace and comments.
Compacts everything into a single, dense string of code.
A 100KB file becomes 85KB.

vibranium.name: Vibranium
vibranium.short: Injects military-grade security headers (X-XSS, Strict-Transport). Repels XML-RPC attacks like bullets on a shield.
vibranium.full:
### Indestructible.

Your site is under attack. Now.
Vibranium doesn't fight. **It absorbs**.

#### Header Hardening

Vibranium injects an impenetrable alloy of security directives into your HTTP headers:
- **X-XSS-Protection**
- **X-Frame-Options**
- **Strict-Transport-Security (HSTS)**

It also shuts down XML-RPC hermetically. Any request is rejected immediately.

loki.name: Loki
loki.short: God of Deception. Creates invisible Honeypot fields in forms that trap bots before they can spam.
loki.full:
### You Cannot Fight What Is Real. And What Is Not.

Firewalls block IPs. IPs change. Bots evolve.
Loki uses **Deception**.

#### The Honeypot Trap

In every form, Loki inserts a hidden input field.
- A human never sees it.
- A bot sees it and fills it.

As soon as that field is filled, Loki laughs.
The submission is silently discarded. The bot thinks it succeeded, so it doesn't retry. Your database stays clean.

hawkeye.name: Hawkeye
hawkeye.short: Never misses a shot. Identifies useless scripts (Emoji, Embeds) and surgically eliminates them from loading.
hawkeye.full:
### One Shot. No Waste.

WordPress is obese. It loads dozens of scripts "just in case".
Hawkeye hates waste. Hawkeye has perfect aim.

#### Surgical Dequeue

Hawkeye scans the loading queue.
Sees Emoji script? Shoots it.
Sees Contact Form 7 CSS where there is no form? Shoots it.

Result: Your pages weigh 30% less.

jarvis.name: J.A.R.V.I.S.
jarvis.short: The system brain. Uses AI to optimize SEO titles and manages script loading order (Defer/Async).
jarvis.full:
### "Just A Rather Very Intelligent System".

Jarvis is the invisible butler orchestrating everything.

#### Asset Orchestration (Defer & Async)

JavaScript blocks rendering. Jarvis rewrites `

vision.name: Vision
vision.short: Sees the future. Injects Resource Hints (DNS Prefetch) to connect to external servers before the user even clicks.
vision.full:
### Probability Calculation: 100%.

Vision anticipates.
Vision understands dependencies (Google Fonts, Analytics) and establishes connections *before* they are needed.

#### DNS Prefetch & Preconnect

Vision inserts `` tags.
Tells the browser: "Hey, we'll need Google Fonts soon. Connect NOW".
When download time comes, the pipe is already open. It's instant.

iron-man.name: Iron Man
iron-man.short: The final armor. Activates 'Fury Mode' to delay heavy scripts (like GTM or AdSense) until user interaction.
iron-man.full:
### I Am Iron Man. And This is Fury Mode.

Sometimes, normal optimization isn't enough. You have heavy marketing scripts.
Iron Man activates **FURY MODE**.

In Fury Mode, Iron Man freezes these scripts.
He doesn't load them at all.
Then, the user moves the mouse.
In that precise millisecond, Iron Man injects the scripts.
The user notices nothing. But to Google, your site is a lightweight rocket.

hulk.name: Hulk
hulk.short: Smash. Deletes old revisions, spam comments and expired transients with pure brute force.
hulk.full:
### HULK... CLEANS!

The WordPress Database is a hoarder.
Revisions, transients, spam.

#### Brute Force Cleanup

Hulk has no patience. Hulk enters the Database and smashes everything useless.
Executes massive `DELETE` queries.
- Revisions gone.
- Spam gone.
- Transients gone.

He doesn't optimize tables with a feather. He defragments them with punches.

thanos.name: Thanos
thanos.short: Perfect balance. Deletes orphan metadata and broken relationships. A simple snap and the database is clean.
thanos.full:
### Destiny Awaits.

Thanos deals with the existential.
Orphan data. Zombie data.

#### The Snap

Thanos executes The Snap.
Scans table relationships.
Deletes with cold mathematical logic everything without a purpose.
Creates perfect balance.

doctor-strange.name: Dr. Strange
doctor-strange.short: Manipulates time. Controls how many revisions are saved and autosave interval, preventing temporal chaos in DB.
doctor-strange.full:
### Dormammu, I've Come To Bargain.

Time is relative in WordPress.
Revisions pile up.

#### Chronokinesis

Dr. Strange rewrites time constants.
1. **Revision Limit**: Loop set to max 5 revisions.
2. **Autosave Interval**: Dilates time to 300 seconds (5 minutes).

Controlling time means controlling stability.

zenith.hero_subtitle: Zenith doesn't just "optimize". It spies, attacks, defends, and conquers. A complete suite of tactical tools to dominate SERPs with military precision.
zenith.grid_subtitle: Click each module to access the full tactical dossier.
zenith.cta_title: Is Your Site Ready for War?

vader-console.title: Vader Console (Competitor Spy)
vader-console.short: Enter an enemy URL. Zenith brutally extracts Title, H1, Structure, and Keyword Strategy.
vader-console.full:
### Unfair Advantage: Know Enemy Moves Before They Make Them.

Imagine walking into your competitors' offices and reading their secret files. **Vader Console** gives you this power.

In SEO, information is ammunition.

#### What You Will See:

1. **Skeletal Structure**: The psychological logic behind their headings.
2. **Density and Frequency**: How often they use the keyword.
3. **Content Gap**: Where you can win.

You aren't just creating content. You are a general.

neural-graph.title: Neural Link Graph
neural-graph.short: Visualize your site structure as a neural network. Spot 'red nodes' (weak pages).
neural-graph.full:
### Your Sight Expands: See The Invisible.

Your website is a living organism. A synapse network where authority flows.
**Neural Link Graph** turns the lights on.

#### Immediate Visual Diagnostics
1. **Red Nodes**: Dead pages. Save them.
2. **Giant Nodes**: Power centers. Distribute the power.

Technical SEO is plumbing. Become a divine plumber.

orphan-scanner.title: Orphan Scanner
orphan-scanner.short: Finds invisible 'Orphan' content. Applies 'Nuclear Option' forcing links from related posts.
orphan-scanner.full:
### No Soldier Left Behind.

Orphan content is a tragedy.
**Orphan Scanner** is your rescue team.

1. **Deep Scan**.
2. **Relevance Analysis**.
3. **The Nuclear Option**: Forces a bridge if no natural parent is found.

Recovering an orphan has infinite ROI.

protocol-droid.title: Protocol Droid (Auto-Defense)
protocol-droid.short: Automatically blocks parasitic AI bots (GPTBot, Claude) via robots.txt. Your data is sovereign.
protocol-droid.full:
### Your Content Is Yours. Not Some Californian AI's.

Silent bots are scraping your site right now.
**Protocol Droid** is your shield.

1. **Instant ID**: Updated kill-list.
2. **Selective Permissions**: Block thieves, let Googlebot pass.
3. **Resource Saving**: -30% server load.

Don't give away your work.

project-starlight.title: Project Starlight (Voice Search)
project-starlight.short: Injects 'Speakable' schema (Beta). Speak directly to voice assistants.
project-starlight.full:
### Be Heard By Millions.

Future of search is spoken.
**Project Starlight** is a megaphone.

Injects 'SpeakableSpecification'.
1. **Passage to Read**: Tell Google exactly what to read.
2. **Voice Authority**: Be the cited Source.
3. **Future-Proofing**.

network-hub.title: Network Hub (Distribution)
network-hub.short: Automatic ping to engines. Posts to Reddit and protects RSS feed.
network-hub.full:
### Automated Omnipresence.

Writing is half the job. Distribution is the other.

#### Subspace Signal (Ping)
Send a pulse to indexers instantly.

#### Infiltrator Agent (Reddit)
Auto-posts to target Subreddit.

#### RSS Armor
Delays feed output by 60 mins to ensure Google indexes YOU first.

drive-importer.title: Drive Importer (Hyperdrive)
drive-importer.short: Syncs Google Drive folders. Converts WebP, cleans HTML, publishes.
drive-importer.full:
### From Thought to Publish at Light Speed.

Write on Docs. Publish on WP.
**Drive Importer** removes friction.

1. **Code Sanitization**: Cleans dirty HTML.
2. **Image Management**: Downloads and converts to WebP.
3. **Perfect Workflow**.

tractor-beam.title: Tractor Beam (Redirect Core)
tractor-beam.short: Monitors 404 errors and auto-redirects to similar content.
tractor-beam.full:
### Never Lose a Visitor Again.

A 404 is a lost customer.
**Tractor Beam** activates.

1. **Intent Analysis**.
2. **Fuzzy Matching**: finds > 80% similar content.
3. **Surgical Redirect**: Transports user to the right page.

User never sees the error.

auto-linker.title: Auto-Linker (Internal Mesh)
auto-linker.short: Define a keyword, Zenith creates links in entire historical archive.
auto-linker.full:
### Weave Your Web of Authority.

Want to link "SEO" in 500 old posts?
Zenith does it in a click.

#### Internal Mesh
Retroactively applies link building.
1. **Frequency Control**: Only first occurrence.
2. **Instant Boost**.
